meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #2573.

td.p: Charles Shaughnessy, an actor from The Nanny
Shawntel Smith, a Miss America from Muldrow, Oklahoma
Noah Wyle, an actor from ER

tr.td: ENGLISH LIT
LIBATIONS
QUOTATIONS
HISTORIC BANDS
TAKE FIVE
PIGS ON FILM

Charles
')

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [Before the "Think!" music plays] We\'re looking for the term.)
...
(Alex: From Sheridan\'s play The School for Scandal.)
ShawntelWhat [scribble] ?
$250
NoahWhat is a malapropism
$2,500
CharlesWhat is a malapropism
$5,000
malapropism')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'This term for the ludicrous misuse of a word is from the name of a character in an 18th century play')

tr.td: VOCABULARY
This term for the ludicrous misuse of a word is from the name of a character in an 18th century play
Noah
Shawntel
Charles
2nd place: $10,100 for the John Wayne Cancer Institute + Race to Erase MS
3rd place: $10,000 to the Miss America Foundation
Winner: (At least) $15,900 for the Sunshine Mission Church in Santa Monica, California
Noah
Shawntel
Charles

2 W

21 R
(including 2 DDs),
1 W
